alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Montezuma and west central La Plata Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 345 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Cortez, or 32 miles north of Shiprock, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mancos. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 491 in Colorado near mile marker 27. U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 27 and 70. Colorado 145 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Southwest San Juan Mountains
